projects.name: RAG-based Chatbot for the 2019 Labor Law
projects.description: Built an efficient hybrid retrieval architecture combining ChromaDB for vector-based search and Rank BM25 for keyword-based search. Implemented a re-ranking mechanism with FlagEmbedding to filter and reorder documents, ensuring high-quality, relevant information for GPT-4 answer generation.

projects.name: Video Tracking on MOT17 Dataset
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Computer Vision project focused on multi-object tracking, demonstrating understanding of the full ML pipeline from data preprocessing (converting MOT17 dataset to YOLO format) to fine-tuning a pre-trained YOLOv8 model for object detection.

projects.name: Poem Generation
projects.description: Independently developed a deep learning model for automated poem generation. The project involved collecting and preprocessing data, training the model using PyTorch, integrating special tokens (<sos>, <eos>, <eol>), and applying temperature sampling to control randomness for unique verse generation.

projects.name: Traffic Sign Detection
projects.description: Focused on applying Traditional Machine Learning techniques, using OpenCV for image processing, extracting key features, and training a Support Vector Machine (SVM) classifier with Scikit-learn to categorize different types of traffic signs.
